advisory.name: RLBA-2022:2064
advisory.synopsis: python-linux-procfs bug fix and enhancement update
advisory.topic: An update for python-linux-procfs is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisory.description: For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Linux 8.6 Release Notes linked from the References section.

fixes.description: python-linux-procfs: pflags exception getting info for completed PID
traceback if there is non-utf8 character in the /proc/PID/cmdline
